author: Unreal Engine
description:
You have an amazing idea to build in UEFN. You've already added cool mechanics and juices in the project, you want your experience to run smoothly on all the platforms, but you're still struggling to elevate it from "functional" to "fantastic". What do you do?

This session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 walks you through a journey about the art and science of de-janking UEFN projects to deliver a polished, immersive, and unforgettable player experience. 

The talk is packed with best practices and guidelines through real-world examples, strategies for streamlining performance, creating satisfying player interactions, and crafting a world that feels alive and responsive. 

Topics covered include performance optimization, gameplay flow refinement, visual polish, game feel enhancements, and those crucial final touches for polished brilliance. You'll leave with practical, actionable tips you can use right away to make your game feel polished, cohesive, and fun.

Learn more about UE
title: De-Jank 101: From Rough to Refined in UEFN | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Dive into the creative and technical journey behind LEGO®: Dark Space. This session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025 explores the full arc—from initial spark to concept development, problem-solving, and execution—covering everything from cinematic storytelling and dynamic gameplay to intricate mechanics like generating a fully randomized map each playthrough. 

Discover how Team Unite blended gaming and narrative, with real code snippets and tech examples shared post-session to inspire your own projects. Come and see how cutting-edge tech and the playful spirit of LEGO collide.

Learn more about UEFN here: unrealengine.com/uses/uefn-unreal-editor-for-fortnite

#LEGODarkSpace, #GameDevelopment, #TeamUnite, #UnrealEditorForFortnite, #UEFN, #Fortnite, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: LEGO® Dark Space: Technical Deep Dive Into Innovation (UEFN) | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, Cavrnus demonstrates how to add instant multi-user collaboration to any project with the new Cavrnus Spatial Connector (CSC), a free plugin for Unreal Engine in the Fab store. 

CSC supports a number of multi-user features such as voice and video conferencing, screen and content sharing, real-time transcription and text chat with translation, data synchronization, digital twin integration, and an optional OpenAI connection.

The session covers adding the CSC plugin to an installed version of Unreal Engine and enabling it in a project; configuring and customizing CSC, both with and without coding; using the Collab Viewer Template (CVT) with CSC; and adding the CVT to new or existing projects.

Learn more about Unreal Engine here: unrealengine.com

#Cavrnus, #MultiuserCollaboration, #CavrnusSpatialConnector, #CollabViewerTemplate, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Adding Multiuser Collaboration to Any UE Project or Packaged App | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
